title: cbor decode error
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2021.12.3-beta`

OS & Version: Linux (Ubuntu)

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
was facing issue #3165 , git pulled latest and tried re-running the node and rpcd.


#### Backtrace

````

[EROR] [01-02|13:12:47.681] receipt unmarshal failed                 err="cbor decode error [pos 7]: invalid integer 58 (bytes); got major 2, expected 0 or 1"
````
